Ingredients.2: 1 (12 ounce) package red confectioner's coating (such as Wilton® Candy Melts®)

Ingredients.3: 1 (14 ounce) package chocolate sandwich cookies (such as Oreo®)

Directions.1: Shape red fondant into 72 little horns relative to the size of the cookies. Line 2 baking sheets with parchment paper.

Directions.2: Place red confectioner's coating in the top of a double boiler over simmering water. Stir constantly, scraping down the sides with a rubber spatula to avoid scorching, until melted, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat.

Directions.3: Use a spoon to cover the top and sides of each cookie with melted red coating. Place on the prepared baking sheet. Stick 2 small devil horns near the top and add 2 candy eyeballs. Let stand until dry, about 1 hour.
